resources.string: Accessibility must be enabled and the Notification Check accessibility service must be enabled for the app to be active.\n\nOpen the Accessibility settings?
The Notification Check listener service must be enabled for the app to be active.\n\nOpen the notification listener settings?
Instructions for how to use this app

When the phone\'s ringer is set to silent/vibrate and the screen is off, if the phone receives any notifications it will vibrate when you turn the screen back on.\n\nUse these settings to customize this app\'s behavior.
This notification service allows the Notification Check app to read all Android notifications.

This accessibility service allows the Notification Check app to read all Android notifications.\n\nNote: On some devices, turning this on will cause certain actions to be read aloud via the Text-To-Speech (TTS) system. This is a bug with the device\'s software and can be fixed by disabling or uninstalling all TTS systems.
